Description: 12 beads in different shapes and materials. A: Lentoid bead made of turquoise faience. B: Two segmented cylindrical beads, made of white faience, up to four segments preserved. C: Two flattened spherical beads, made of white faience. D: Seven disc-shaped beads, five somewhat smaller made of white and light blue faience, two made of ostrich eggshell.
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
